entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight except gusting to 70 at times overnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
